about_the_game:
BUILD YOUR DEFENSES. BUILD YOUR CHARACTER. DEFEND AGAINST THE WAVES.
Bonelords is a Terraria-like wave defense game, with an emphasis on combat & character build choices. Defend the mystical Fort Platz as it teleports all across the lands of Spegroon.

Advance Your Character

Play and grow your character to play the way you want. Weapons can be upgraded throughout the game, so you have an ever expanding list of options as you play. Different armor is available, specializing and powering you up as you go. Level up your character's stats in whatever way you see fit. No two characters are the same!

Defense Building

Build your own defenses to stop the hordes. Put up walls, set up turrets, and even lay traps for the enemy. The terrain can be broken down, and your structures will collapse if too much breaks. If your structures crumble, the enemy (and yourself) will get crushed under it's weight!

Multiplayer

Don't go it alone! Split screen multi-player with up to four other players. Have people freely hop in and out, the game scales any new players to an appropriate power level, so nobody is ever left behind!
